== Description ==
Like all hill biomes, the birch forest hills featured hillier terrain than regular birch forests, being identical to them in every other aspect. It was fairly common due to its wide spread.

== Mobs ==
Birch forest hills used the same mob spawning chances as birch forests.

The following mobs naturally spawn here:
